Ä€~ maji de darui zenbu aitsu no sei
(Miyaoka) Honto ni sonna hen na imi wa nai desu kara.

lines.romaji: (Asami) Ha? Nanika sakki kara hen na yatsu ni karamarechatta mitai na kao shitemasu kedo, somosomo socchi ga utagawashii koudou shite nakereba watashi datte konna asa hayaku kara kite nai desu kara ne.
Dakara sou iu n janai tte itteru desho?
(Asami) Sou iu n janai tte kikonsha ga wazawaza kekkon yubiwa o hazushite renrakusaki o koukan shiteru jiten de ayashimaru no wa touzen desu yo ne?
Ah, nan nara okusan ni kakunin shimashou ka?

lines.romaji: (Asami) 'Danna-san te fudan shokuji-chuu kekkon yubiwa hazusareru n desu ka? To iu no mo desu ne kinou Muan de wakai josei to renrakusaki o koukan shiteru toki ni kekkon yubiwa o hazusarete teâ€¦'.  Wakatta wakattaâ€¦!
Mou renraku shinai kara sore de ii desho?
(Asami) Yakusoku desu yo. Moshi kanojo ga kanashimu you na koto ga attara watashi yurusanain de.  Wakatta tte ba.
(Asami) Ato omise no kagi wa gojibun de aketa hou ga ii to omoimasu yo.
Daibu yatsu atari gimi datta kedo
(Asami) Daigakuin sotsugyou go 30-sai de watashi wa harete kenkyuuin ni natta
(Iyahon) â™ªï½ To itte mo tokuni jikan ga kimatte iru wake de wa naku (Iyahon) â™ªï½ shukkin jikan wa hito ni yotte machimachi
Rabo de no fukusou wa kihonteki ni jiyuu
Doudemo ii kedo Kurokkusu-ritsu ga takai
(Asami) Koko de wa minna ichinichijuu sorezore no jikken o shite iru
(Asami) To itte mo jikken wa umaku ikanai kÄ“su ga hotondo de mainichi shikou sakugo o kurikaeshi nagara sukoshi zutsu katachi ni shite iku shika nai
Kono ki no tooku naru you na sagyou ga hada ni awazu seishinteki ni maitte shimau hito mo iru rashii
(Asami) Kibishii kureemu ya sasaina misu mo yurusarenai puresshÄ
Sara ni wa shi made keiken shite iru node warito heiki

lines.romaji: Chinami ni rabo ni wa kyÅyÅ no kenbikyou ga atte watashi mo yoku tsukau no dakedo kono toki mae no hito ga jibun no miyasui settei ni shita mama ni shite iru koto ga atte, sono baai ichi ichi pinto ya kÅryou o naosanakereba ikenai node sore wa maikai ira tto suru
13-ji chuushoku wa gakushoku de senpai no Tae-san to taberu koto ga ooi
Watashi, are nankai ka itta n da kedo, zenzen naosanai no yo.

lines.romaji: (Tae) Ano hito sa, posudoku to shite wa yuushuu n da kedo, sou iu toko jakkan ketsuraku shiteru yo ne.
(Asami) Tashika ni chotto kawarimono kamo desu ne.
Demo gakusei ni wa ninki an da yo ne.
Nanika sa, aaiu mechakucha kashikoi no ni darashinai kanji ga, gyaku ni tensai-ppokute hikaren janai?
(Asami) Jissai tensai desu shi ne.  Demo sa kenbikyou no pinto modosanakute mo ii hodo no tensai de wa nai yo ne.
(Asami) Tashika ni pinto modosanai n dattara mou chotto tensai ja nakya ikenai desu ne.
Chinami ni, pinto modosanakute mo ii tensai tte dare darou ne.
(Asami) Aa, ima dattara Fujii Souta-kun toka desu ka ne.
Aa, kare wa modosanakute mo ii ne.
Un, modosanakute ii. Nani nara zenbu dashippa demo ii.
(Asami) Sou desu ne.  Ato Messi ne.
Ano doriburu wa pinto modosanakute ii ne.
Dare mo kenbikyou o tsukawanai kedo
Chuushoku ga sumu to mata jikken no tsuzuki
Chinami ni ichinichi no shuugyou jikan wa toku ni kimatte inakute 18-ji ni kaeru hito mo ireba 24-ji sugi made yatte iru hito mo iru
(Asami) Sonna kanji de watashi wa hitasura kenkyuu ni bottou suru mainichi deâ€¦
Atto iu ma ni san-nen no tsukihi ga tatta
Ima no tokoro mada kore to itta seika wa agerarete inai
Dakara touzen pinto wa chanto modoshite iru
(Asami) Sonna aru hi jikka ni kaeru toâ€¦
Kondo no nichiyou sa, Haruka ga kareshi tsuretekuru n da kedo ne.
(Asami) Haruka ga kareshi tsuretekuru no tte hajimete nan ja nai?
Musume-san o boku ni kudasai-teki na yatsu ka na?
(Asami) Sou kamo ne.  Da yo ne.
(Asami) Ii jan, ii ja~n. Dousun no? OK suru no?
Eâ€¦ Kihonteki ni wa OK da yo.
Yoppodo hanshakai-teki na hito ja nai kagiri ne.
(Asami) Sasuga ni sonna hito wa tsuretekonai desho.
Aa, maa, sono hen wa otousan mo shinpai shite nai n da kedo neâ€¦
(Asami) E? Nani? Nanika hoka ni shinpai na koto ga aru no?
N~â€¦ Iya, mondai wa bimyou na rain datta toki da yo ne.

lines.japanese: æ˜ã‚‰ã‹ã«ãƒ¤ãƒãã†ãªäººãªã‚‰ åå¯¾ã™ã‚Œã°ã„ã„ã‚“ã ã‘ã©ã•ãã†ã˜ã‚ƒãªãã¦ åå¯¾ã™ã‚‹ã»ã©ã˜ã‚ƒãªã„ã‚“ã ã‘ã©ä½•ã‹ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨å«Œã ãªã£ã¦ã„ã† ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ã£ã¦ã‚ã‚‹ã˜ã‚ƒãªã„ï½¡
lines.romaji: Akiraka ni yaba sou na hito nara hantai sureba ii n da kedo sa, sou janakute, hantai suru hodo ja nai n da kedo nanika chotto iya da na tte iu rain tte aru janai.
(Asami) Tatoeba?  Nanika koko ni sangurasu burasagetetari toka sa.
Muda ni sa, shatsu no botan o akete suhada o miseteru kanji no hito tokaâ€¦
Sou sou souâ€¦ Hantai suru hodo ja nai n da kedo sa, nanika chotto iya jan.
Wakaru yo, demo Haruka ga erabu hito dakara, daijoubu da to omou kedo ne.
(Asami) Sou ka~ Haruka mo kekkon ka.
Kou iu no tte sa, kocchi-gawa tte donna fukusou de mukaereba ii no ka na.
Musume-san o boku ni kudasai tte iwareru-gawa no fukusou.
Futsuu de ii n ja nai?
Iya, futsuu ttsuttemo, sasuga ni kore ja mazui desho.
(Asami) Ah, sasuga ni sore wa mazui kamo ne.
Ichiou sa, ichigun no fuku ni shitokeba?  Ah, arigatou.
Seiketsu-kan aru shi.  Da yo ne.
(Asami) Otousan, saki ni haitte ii yo.
(Asami) Nee, kondo kareshi tsuretekuru n desho?
Sore tte, yappari are na no? Musume-san o boku ni kudasai-teki na yatsu?
(Asami) Nande kuru no?  Tana tsukuru no tetsudatte morau no.
(Asami) Koushite gojitsu Haruka no kareshi waâ€¦
Doumo, hajimemashite, Nakayama Kenji to moushimasu.
(Asami) Ichigun no fuku no chichi ni mukaerareâ€¦

lines.romaji: Chigau chigauâ€¦! Gyaku gyaku gyakuâ€¦!  Eh? Gyaku?
(Asami) Ichigun no fuku no chichi ni miokurare kaette itta
(Asami) Chinamini, sangurasu to botan no ken wa daijoubu datta rashii
Tokorode kou yatte byouki no gen'in to naru biseibutsu o mite iru to tamani omou koto ga aru
Kono biseibutsu mo jitsu wa zense wa ningen dattari suru no kana to
Sonna kanji de jikken ni bottou suru mainichi wa tsudzukiâ€¦
Chinamini kenkyui to shite wa ima no tokoro igakkai ni kakumei o okosu you na hakken wa dekite inai kedo kono go-nen de chiisai seika wa ikutsu ka ageru koto ga dekiâ€¦
(Tae) O, ronbun noru no kyou dattan da.
(Asami) Igakkai ni tashou no kouken wa dekite iru to omou
(Tae) Sou ieba Usui-san kara meeru kimashita yo, Kondou-san no yonda tte. /Ima wa doko ni iru no?/
(Tae) Ima ne Amerika ikkai itte sono ato hantoshi go ni ShingapÅruâ€¦.
(Asami) Sonna naka tsuini Haruka ga kekkon
Aite wa ano toki no kareshi Nakayama Kenji-kun
Dokotonaku uchi no chichi ni nite iru ki ga shinai demo nai
Yon kaime no jinsei de hajimete mukaeru Haruka no kekkon
(Asami) Sore ni shitemo ano Haruka ga kekkon to wa kangaibukai
(Kumiko) Otoko no ko kana? Onna no ko kana?
(Kumiko) Onna no ko ga ii no?
Ah demo goukei de hyaku sanjuu-nen ijou ikiteru kara nagaiki wa nagaiki ka
(Asami) Jimoto ni kaetta tsuide ni hisashiburi ni Maririn to ocha
Sore de ne 96 ueru pureeto tte iu chiisai ana ga 96-ko aiteru youki ga aru n da kedo soko ni ne mushoku toumei no ekitai o ireteku no.

lines.romaji: Demo ekitai ga mushoku toumei da kara yudan suru to doko made ireta ka wakaranaku narun da yo ne.
(Asami) Sou, shikamo wakaranaku nattara mou ikkai saisho kara yarinaoshi.  Eh, sorette sa tochuu de koe kakeraretari shitara yabai yo ne?
Watashi wa ne taichou kanri ga ichiban taihen da ne.
Nanika maitoshi shintai kensa ga aru n da kedo, sore ga mou chou kibishii no.

lines.romaji: Ketsueki, nouha, shindenzu, shiryoku, chouryoku, hana no tsuukiryou ato, heikou kankaku toka, tonikaku iroiro.
(Asami) Mou sore zenbu jan.  Mou zenbu.
De ikko demo hikkakattara, shibaraku furaito kinshi da kara ne.
(Asami) Haa~ jaa kaze mo hikenai tte koto?
(Asami) Watashi ni wa muri da na~.  Hahaha...
(Asami) Jaa are da Maririn wa tsune ni choukenkou tte koto da.
Aa~ sou da ne choukenkou yuuryouji da ne.
'Yuuryouji' de wa nai kedo ne 35 da kara ne.
Hoshounin mitai da ne.  Tashika ni ne onaji da ne.
(Natsuki) Ee~ mou sonna tatsu n da.
(Natsuki) Ne, mata minna de karaoke ikou?
Aa iu toki tte sa chotto mayowanai?  Nani ga?
(Asami) Ano sa, ohisashiburi~ no nagare de sa, sono mama koko suwatte sa issho ni ocha suru patÄn mo aru jan.
Aa, watashi isshun sou naru patÄn kana to omotta.
(Asami) Sou da yo ne. Demo sa, futari ga sonna tsumori janakattara warui kara, kocchi kara wa iizurai yo ne.
Iizurai yo ne. Maa, mukou mo sou kamo shirenai kedo ne.
(Asami) Demo sakki mo sa, isshun kore docchi? Mitaina kuuki ga nagareta yo ne?  Aa~ nagareta ne.
Watashi ga ittara futari koko suwatteta kana.
Dou darou, maa, bimyou da yo ne~.
Nanika sa, kore gurai no kyori-kan no doukyuusei tte muzukashii yo ne.
Motomoto wa sonna kyori-kan ja nakattan dakedo ne.
(San-nin) â™ª~ Mata deaeru no o shinjite
Konaida sa, konna no detekita no.
(Asami) Kore chuugaku no toki da.  Un.
Kore Round One ga dekite sugu da yo ne.

lines.romaji: (Asami) Sou dakke?  Sou, de kore o kikkake ni hanasu you ni natta n da yo.
(Asami) Sou ka, kore ga kikkake datta ka.
Sou da yo. A-chin ga puri-ki no mae de sa hitori de tatazundeta n da yo.
Chuu-ni to wa omoenai aishuu ga senaka kara ba~ tte deteta yo.
Sore wa kitto hyaku sanjuu-sai no aishuu.
De watashi ga koe kakete, de kono puri tottan da yo.
Sou ieba sa, mae kara kikitakatta n da kedo...
